Uses of Interface
net.sf.JRecord.External.CopybookLoader

  • Packages that use CopybookLoader 
    Package Description
    net.sf.JRecord.External
    This package holds classes that convert Record-Layouts (copybooks) between external Files and the internal representation.

    • Uses of CopybookLoader in net.sf.JRecord.External

      Subinterfaces of CopybookLoader in net.sf.JRecord.External 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ICopybookLoaderCobol 
      interface  ICopybookLoaderStream

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BaseCopybookLoader 
      class  CobolCopybookLoader 
      static class  CopybookLoaderFactory.NoCb2xml
      This is a dummy class to be used if cb2xml is nt present It simply gives an error message if used.
      class  CsvNamesFirstLineFileLoader
      Class to build a copybook (ExternalRecord) from a CSV file with the names on the first line
      static class  CsvNamesFirstLineFileLoader.Tab
      Create class to load Layout from CSV file with names on the first Line with Tab used as the field seperator
      class  DbCsvCopybookLoader
      Class to load DB Table definition extract (in particular DB2).
      static class  RecordEditorCsvLoader.Comma
      CSV Parser - Tab
      static class  RecordEditorCsvLoader.Tab
      CSV Parser - Tab
      class  RecordEditorXmlLoader
      Class to Load a RecordLayout (Record or Line Description) from an XML file (RecordEditor-XML)
      class  XmlCopybookLoader
      This class will load a cb2xml XML Copybook into the Record Layout
      class  XmlFileLoader
